channel.title: Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds" - What team Would you sugest

item.title: Re: Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds
item.content:encoded:
and if your already doing outskirts, get goodboys jutsu(double chance of ally drops) and use it every mission.
then have emo, sticky and any other ally, maybe stalkergilr/ pinky 2 for extra missions
(other outskirts will decrease strength, but if you think you can manage it with them, the have another outskirts ally)

then run B-rank ninjutsu missions and epic dog urination technique on 'rock out on stage' missions.

item.title: Re: Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds
item.content:encoded: The main Outskirts ally to use for it would be Sticky, so that you can farm Sticky Thread as well. Farming B-rank Tai missions for Rock Out on Stage and using Epic Dog Urination Technique is the best idea. Using Sticky, one of the other Outskirts allies, and either a third one or Emosuke would be my suggestion.

item.title: Re: Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds
item.content:encoded:
@ Ren Po Ken: this question is from a season1-player. so there is no olmek, right lv2.

@portwizard: if you have access to b-rank missions then organize some smokebombs and try to get emo-cd from the b-mission "Rock Out on Stage!". (smokebomb your way through the other missions, if you don't want to do them) Use the jutsus "white eye" or "epique dog urination technic"

item.title: Re: Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds
item.content:encoded: The best way to get Emo Rock CDs is to take Olmek, Emosuke (so you can farm Hot Pics as well), and one of the wastelands allies that drops Emo CDs (Flutie, Tubbie, and maybe the Twins), in B-Rank Tai Missions and use The Agony of Defeat (Right Lvl 2's justsu). 100% ally drop for 100 Stamina. You are guaranteed to get 12 a day minimum.

item.title: Re: Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds
item.content:encoded: I suggest having Emosuke and Spot in your team and run B-Rank Taijutsu missions. But if you want to work on Wasteland items, I have no clue.

item.title: Re: Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds
item.content:encoded: Unless you have Survived the Impossible, you might want to run D-Rank Missions instead. The Stamina Loss of Outskirts missions hampers Emo Rock CD collection.

item.title: Easyest way to get Emo Rock Cds
item.content:encoded:
Ok I'm season 1 so no olmek and no Hoclaus I have Emosuke, Tubby, Sticky, Flutie and The Twins
I was going to run outskirts with Flutie, Sticky and Tubby that way I can work on my other Wasteland items
Anyone know a faster way with these Allies?
